title: (x) Klimt elegant capitals - Diotima (Calligraphic 810) {Mike Y}
content:
I know I have seen it, but…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [klimt.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403014816/http:/typophile.com/files/klimt.jpg) | 39.39 KB |
author: Paul F

comments.content:
I think it looks a lot like [Diotima](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403014816/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/diotima/).

- Mike Yanega
I think it may be [Calligraphic 810](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403014816/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/calligraphic-810/) from Bitstream?

Marlen

Bitstream couldn’t use the name Diotima legally - so they renamed the font Calligraphic 810.

BTW - you may like to know about this site:  
 [http://desktoppub.about.com/cs/findafont/a/fontaliases\_c.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403014816/http:/desktoppub.about.com/cs/findafont/a/fontaliases_c.htm)

It shows you all the names Bitstream used… plus more info.

Heron2001,

Thank you! I didn’t know that about Diotima/Calligraphic 810. And thanks for the link…

/Mårten
